functions.name: isString
functions.description: Checks if the passed value is a string

functions.name: isJsonString
functions.description: Determine if a string is JSON or not

params.name: str
params.description: The string to check for JSON formatting

functions.name: parseJSON
functions.description: Parses the JSON returned by a network request

returns.description: The parsed JSON, status from the response

params.name: response
params.description: A response from a network request

functions.name: parseURL
functions.description:
Parse a URL string into an object that defines its structure

The returned object will have the following properties:

href: the full URL protocol: the request protocol hostname: the target for the request port: the port for the request pathname: any URL after the host search: query parameters hash: the URL hash

functions.name: haveSameHost
functions.description: Returns true if both a and b have the same protocol, hostname, and port.

functions.name: isFullURL
functions.description: Checks if the URL is already a full URL

functions.name: startsWithSlash
functions.description: Checks if the given string starts with '/'

params.name: string
params.description: The string to check

functions.name: endsWithSlash
functions.description: Checks if the given string ends with '/'

params.name: string
params.description: The string to check

functions.name: removeLeadingSlash
functions.description: Remove a leading slash from the given string

params.name: string
params.description: The string to remove the slash from

functions.name: removeTrailingSlash
functions.description: Remove a trailing slash from the given string

params.name: string
params.description: The string to remove the slash from

functions.name: stripSlashes
functions.description: Strip slashes from the given path

params.name: path
params.description: The path to remove slashes from

functions.name: isFetchError
functions.description: Checks if the given error is or inherits from FetchError

functions.name: isTimeoutError
functions.description: Checks if the given object represents a "timeout" error

fields.name: contentType
fields.description:
The default value for the request contentType

For now, defaults to the same value that jQuery would assign. In the future, the default value will be for JSON requests.

params.name: url
params.description: The url for the request

params.name: options
params.description: The options hash for the request

methods.name: _shouldSendHeaders
methods.description:
Determine whether the headers should be added for this request

This hook is used to help prevent sending headers to every host, regardless of the destination, since this could be a security issue if authentication tokens are accidentally leaked to third parties.

To avoid that problem, subclasses should utilize the headers computed property to prevent authentication from being sent to third parties, or implement this hook for more fine-grain control over when headers are sent.

By default, the headers are sent if the host of the request matches the host property designated on the class.
